entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a young wizard.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts and a friend of Harry's.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts and a respected wizard.

entities.name: cornelius fudge
entities.description: A Ministry official who became Minister of Magic.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The governing body for wizards and witches in the UK.

relationships.description: Hagrid is reading the Daily Prophet.
Harry was unaware that there was a Ministry of Magic until Hagrid told him.
Dumbledore was considered for the position of Minister, but Fudge got it instead.
The Ministry is concerned with keeping magic a secret from Muggles.
